slepc-3.18.3 2023-03-24
Report Typos and Errors

RGSetType

Selects the type for the RG object.

Synopsis

#include "slepcrg.h" 
PetscErrorCode RGSetType(RG rg,RGType type)
Logically Collective on rg

Input Parameters

rg  - the region context
type  - a known type

See Also

RGGetType()

Level

intermediate

Location

src/sys/classes/rg/rgbasic.c
